name: The Sequel
description:
“I believe in traditions; I believe in the idea of things being passed between generations and the slow transmission of cultural values through tradition.” Graham Moore 

'The Sequel' is a noir themed interactive short story where you follow a detective's mission to find out what happened in the previous game. Grim clues, surprise twists, suspicious people to interrogate... 

There's no puzzle this exceptionally clever Detective can't solve.

Made during Global Game Jam 2018.

Credits:

juleswhatevs - production, programming, story

Sannimari Honkanen - art & character design

Noora Kaskia - story & audio design

Music by Kevin MacLeod

"Walking Along"
